AI Description: GRASS GIS (Geographic Resources Analysis Support System) is a free and open-source geographic information system (GIS) software suite used for geospatial data management and analysis, image processing, graphics/maps production, spatial modeling, and visualization.
Core Features: Geospatial Data Management, Geospatial Analysis, Image Processing, Spatial Modeling, Visualization
General Tags: Gis, Geospatial Analysis, Image Processing, Spatial Modeling, Visualization
